productId.description: The unique identifier of the product being added to the inventory.

quantity.description: The quantity of the product being added to the inventory.

warehouseId.description: The unique identifier of the warehouse where the inventory is being added.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the inventory was added.

unitPrice.description: The price per unit of the product being added to the inventory.

totalPrice.description: The total price of the product being added to the inventory.
